overview: The film is about a man named Bob who needs a large amount of money in order to pay the medical fees for his dad's surgery. Bob's friend, Roy, decides to lend him a hand by taking the 'easy street', where both of them end up committing a crime by stealing a stranger's car. Both of them get into a bigger trouble when they discover a cute little baby at the back seat of the car that they have stolen.
title: Gila Baby
